title: Ambient Space Vol_1
description: This pack of 10 original audio tracks is perfect for background music, ambient music, sci-fi content and many more uses. The musical tracks were composed with synthesizers and long pads that guide listeners to other planets
longDescription:
This pack consists of 10 original audio tracks perfect for ambient music, sci-fi content background music and many other uses. Musical tracks are created with synthesizers and long pads that transport listeners to other planets.

Link preview: https://youtu.be/u6Cit-jQyPc

Audio details

10 full-length tracks and 6 other different lengths version.

55:36 min of music

About the author

Ermanno Capirone is an italian producer, composer and musician. He can quote the inclusion of his songs in the Netflix series "Running for the Truth_The Alex Schwazer case", the Rai Play series "Le citt√† del futuro" and in the movie "Genoa, comunque e ovunque".

Link: linktr.ee/ermannocapirone

His dedication to composition leads him to develop his own musical project under the pseudonym Bob Rocket. In his latest release "Encelado" the astrophysicist and popularizer Amedeo Balbi talks about space, accompanied by the electronic music of Bob Rocket.

Link: linktr.ee/bobrocket

He works daily as an independent producer in the field of audiovisual music both with synchronization licenses and in the royalty free music scene.
